qas.question: With a day of its release, on what website did the PS3 Slim become the number-one bestseller?
For how many consecutive days did the PS3 Slim hold the number-one spot on Amazon.com?
What score did the PS3 Slim earn from PC World?
PC World's rave review of the PS3 Slim was a complete turnaround from their thoughts on what older model console?
Along with the PS Slim's value, quietness, and lower power usage, what superficial quality did PC World praise?
With a week of its release, on what website did the PS3 Slim become the number-one bestseller?
For how many consecutive days did the PS4 Slim hold the number-one spot on Amazon.com?
What score did the PS4 Slim earn from PC World?
PC World's rave review of the PS3 Slim was a complete turnaround from their thoughts on what newer model console?
Along with the PS Slim's value, quietness, and high power usage, what superficial quality did PC World praise?

context: The PlayStation 3 Slim received extremely positive reviews as well as a boost in sales; less than 24 hours after its announcement, PS3 Slim took the number-one bestseller spot on <a0_0><b5_0>Amazon.com<b5_0/><a0_0/> in the video games section for <a1_0><b6_0>fifteen<b6_0/><a1_0/> consecutive days. It regained the number-one position again one day later. <b8_0>PS3<b8_0/> Slim also received praise from PC World giving it a <a2_0><b7_0>90 out of 100<b7_0/><a2_0/> praising its new <a4_0><b9_0>repackaging<b9_0/><a4_0/> and the new value it brings at a lower price as well as praising its quietness and the reduction in its power consumption. This is in stark contrast to the original <a3_0>PS3<a3_0/>'s launch in which it was given position number-eight on their "The Top 21 Tech Screwups of 2006" list.
